getDevicesInSpaces

org.json.JSONArray getDevicesInSpaces(org.json.JSONArray typeList,
                                      org.json.JSONArray places)
Return the devices of a list of type presents in the places

Parameters:
typeList - the list of types to look for (if null, return all objects)
places - the places where to find the objects (if null return all places)
Returns:
a list of objects contained in these places

getSubtypes

org.json.JSONArray getSubtypes(org.json.JSONArray typeList)
Return a list of types descending from another types

Parameters:
typeList - the list of types to look for (if null, return all subtypes)
Returns:
an empty array if nothing is found or the array of types
